items.content_html: A lightweight 2D open-world survival game starter kit using React, Vite, and SpacetimeDB. Designed for developers who want to build real-time multiplayer survival games with persistent world state, customizable characters, and rich crafting mechanics.

Designed for developers who want to build real-time multiplayer survival games with persistent world state, customizable characters, and rich crafting mechanics.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer â€” A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: A lightweight and modular authentication API built with Express.js and MongoDB. It supports user registration, login, and JWT-based authentication with secure password hashing. Designed with a clean, scalable folder structure for easy integration into larger projects.
items.title: nirmalcodes/auth-api-express-mongo: A lightweight and modular authentication API built with Express.js and MongoDB. It supports user registration, login, and JWT-based authentication with secure password hashing. Designed with a clean, scalable folder structure for easy integration into larger projects.

items.content_html: Fluentity is a lightweight and flexible library for TypeScript/JavaScript applications to consume RESTFul API using models. It's inspired by Active Record and Laravel Eloquent. It provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your API endpoints while maintaining type safety and following object-oriented principles.
items.title: cedricpierre/fluentity-core: Fluentity is a lightweight and flexible library for TypeScript/JavaScript applications to consume RESTFul API using models. It's inspired by Active Record and Laravel Eloquent. It provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your API endpoints while maintaining type safety and following object-oriented principles.

items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.
